sentences.english: Small pelagic fish often accompanying sharks or mantas.
sentences.chinese: 經常伴隨鯊魚和蝠鱝遊動的遠洋小魚。

sentences.english: Sharks cruised toward her lone figure, only to be driven away by rifle shots.
sentences.chinese: 鯊魚遊向她孤單的身軀，只能靠來復槍來擊退。

sentences.english: That he had fed live kittens to sharks. ("No kittens."
All sharks sink unless they swim.
sentences.chinese: 所有的鯊魚在不游泳時都會沉下來。

sentences.english: Shagreen is now commonly made of the skins of sharks and rays.
sentences.chinese: 鯊魚是現在一般由鯊魚和鰩魚的皮膚。

sentences.english: Shagreen is now commonly made of the skins of sharks and rays.
sentences.chinese: 鯊魚是現在一般由鯊魚和鰩魚的皮膚。

sentences.english: Epaulette sharks are not among the rare species.
sentences.chinese: 肩章鯊魚不屬於稀有物種。

sentences.english: The next time I dunked was playing for the Sharks in my second game as a rookie.
sentences.chinese: 第二次灌籃，是在大鯊魚隊作爲新人的第二場比賽。

sentences.english: Lots of spiteful sharks and other venomous beasts breed all over the basin.
sentences.chinese: 大量的惡意鯊魚和其他有毒的動物品種全流域。

sentences.english: Shark skin is made of tiny scales known as dermal denticles that can be seen here.
sentences.chinese: 鯊魚的皮膚是由被稱之爲膚齒的微小鱗屑所構成。

sentences.english: Do you recommend any particular brand as an aftermarket remplacement cable for the sennheiser ?
sentences.chinese: 對於深海鯊魚耳機線你有什麼特別推薦？

sentences.english: Lawmaker urges shark fin trading ban.
sentences.chinese: 中國立法委員呼籲禁止鯊魚翅交易。

sentences.english: The anchor point did not itself provide the shark with the best chance of intercepting a seal.
sentences.chinese: 定位點本身並不能提供給鯊魚截殺海豹的最好機會。

sentences.english: A dugong forages in the seagrass meadows of Shark Bay, Western Australia.
sentences.chinese: 圖爲在西澳洲鯊魚灣的海草中覓食的儒艮。

sentences.english: Collectors pay thousands of dollars for the jawbones of a shark.
sentences.chinese: 收藏者支付數千美元爲了鯊魚下額骨。
